channel.title: Monitoreo Acustico
channel.copyright: by [Diego J. Lizcano](http://dlizcano.github.io/). From [Agencia de Dessarollo](https://destinos.awake.travel/agenciadesarrollo/) of [Awake](https://awake.travel/)

item.title: Reservas de Altagracia-Buenaventura
item.description: Recorders location In Ecolodge Buenaventura which is part of reservas de Altagracia we installed one recorder.

item.title: Selva Vides Reserve
item.description: In the Selva Vides Natural Reserve you can find many species of birds representative of the Amazon foothills.

item.title: Reserva Donde se Oculta el Sol
item.description: Where the Sun Hides, is located in the municipality of Villagarzón in the heart of Putumayo, very close to the Amazon foothills and Amazon plains.

item.title: El Manzanal Natural Reserve
item.description: In the Manzanal Nature Reserve you can find many bird species very close to Popayan.

item.title: Corporación Fin del Mundo
item.description: At the End of the World, you can enjoy ecological trails, pools of transparent waters and amazing waterfalls surrounded by a beautiful natural forest.

item.title: Reserva Selva Mojada
item.description: Recorders location In the Selva Mojada Reserve we deployed four recorders. < function resizeIframe(obj) { obj.

item.title: El Escondite Natural Reserve
item.description: El Escondite is a Private Natural Reserve, located in the municipality of Villagarzón, Putumayo, Colombia, which has a protected area of approximately 124 hectares, of which 70% is in natural regeneration or in a state of conservation.

item.title: Reserva el Amargal
item.description: Recorders location In the Amargal we installed three recorders. < function resizeIframe(obj) { obj.style.height = 1.

item.title: Diego J. Lizcano
item.description: Diego es Biólogo, experto en ecología y conservación de biodiversidad, con experiencia en proyectos de monitoreo usando diversas técnicas y tecnologías aplicadas a la conservación.
